exceptions.exn: The reference Hin was not found in the current environment.

In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params ctgzi : current_term_gt_zero_interface h : name net : network st' : name -> data ps' : list packet out : list raft_output d : raft_data l : list (name * msg) client : clientId id : nat c : input H : handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) H0 : terms_and_indices_from_one_log_ind net H1 : raft_intermediate_reachable net H2 : forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h' H3 : forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \\/ In p' (send_packets h l) Unable to unify "handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l)" with "terms_and_indices_from_one_log_ind {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}".

original: intros orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params ctgzi h net st' ps' out d l client id c HhandleClientRequest HP Hreach Hupdate Hin Hinv. unfold raft_net_invariant_client_request in *. intros. specialize (H net st' ps' out d l client id c HhandleClientRequest HP Hreach Hupdate Hin H). apply H.
